name: nowdatabase
description: NOW - New and Old Worlds - Database of fossil mammals

scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run prisma && npm run config
scripts.install:all: npm i && cd backend && npm i && cd ../frontend && npm i && cd ..
scripts.check: echo "Running checks for both services and cypress tests..." && npm run tsc && npm run lint && echo "All good! :)"
scripts.check:backend: npm run tsc:backend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.check:frontend: npm run tsc:frontend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:cypress
scripts.tsc: npm run tsc:backend && npm run tsc:frontend
scripts.test:backend: npm run test:unit:backend && npm run test:api
scripts.test:api: npm run test:api:build && npm run test:api:run
scripts.test:api:windows: npm run test:api:build && npm run test:api:run:windows
scripts.test:e2e: npm run test:e2e:base -- -it --entrypoint cypress cypress/included:13.15.0 run --browser chrome
scripts.test:e2e:windows: npm run test:e2e:base:windows -- -it --entrypoint cypress cypress/included:13.15.0 run --browser chrome
scripts.test:unit: npm run test:unit:backend && npm run test:unit:frontend
scripts.test:ci:api: npm run test:api:build && npm run test:api:run:base -- nowdb-api-tests
scripts.test:ci:e2e: npm run test:e2e:base -- --user 1001:1001 --entrypoint cypress cypress/included:13.15.0 run --browser chrome
scripts.coverage: npm run coverage:sed && npx nyc report --reporter=lcov
scripts.prisma: cd backend && npx prisma generate --schema prisma/schema.prisma && npx prisma generate --schema prisma/schema_log.prisma
scripts.reset-anon-db: docker exec -it nowdb-db-anon sh -c "mariadb --user root -padmin now_test < /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/sqlfiles/now_test.sql" && docker exec -it nowdb-db-anon sh -c "mariadb --user root -padmin now_log_test < /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/sqlfiles/now_log_test.sql"
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf coverage & rm -rf .nyc_output && rm -rf cypress/screenshots && rm -rf cypress/downloads && cd backend && npm run clean && cd ../frontend && npm run clean
scripts.config: npm run config:dev && npm run config:anon && npm run config:test
scripts.config:test: npm run config:test:base && npm run config:test:host && npm run config:test:coordinator && npm run config:geonames -- .test.env && npm run config:test:yaml && npm run config:test:quotes
scripts.config:anon: npm run config:anon:base && npm run config:anon:host && npm run config:anon:coordinator && npm run config:geonames -- .anon.env
